argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lpfval.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_isperf | |- ( J e. Perf <-> ( J e. Top /\ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ssid | |- X C_ X |
| 4 | 1 | #P_lpss | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ X C_ X ) -> ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) C_ X ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( J e. Top -> ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) C_ X ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X <-> ( ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) C_ X /\ X C_ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_baib | |- ( ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) C_ X -> ( ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X <-> X C_ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( J e. Top -> ( ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X <-> X C_ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X ) <-> ( J e. Top /\ X C_ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_bitri | |- ( J e. Perf <-> ( J e. Top /\ X C_ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) ) ) |
